subject: College Athletics
Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Despite starting slow, Fordham has won six games in a row, clinched a share of the Patriot League title and secured a berth in the N.C.A.A. Football Championship Subdivision playoffs.
snippet: Despite starting slow, Fordham has won six games in a row, clinched a share of the Patriot League title and secured a berth in the N.C.A.A. Football Championship Subdivision playoffs.
